meanings.definition: The rational principle that governs and develops the universe.
meanings.sent1: The logos of nature guides all living things.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the logos of the cosmos to understand its order.
meanings.sent3: The logos of the world whispered secrets to the curious child.
meanings.sent4: In the grand symphony of existence, the logos conducts harmony.
meanings.sent5: The logos of creation weaves a tapestry of interconnectedness.

meanings.definition: A symbol or design representing an organization or company.
meanings.sent1: The company's logo was proudly displayed on their products.
meanings.sent2: She recognized the logo of her favorite sports team immediately.
meanings.sent3: The logo on the building seemed to wink at passersby.
meanings.sent4: The logo on the flag stood as a beacon of unity.
meanings.sent5: The logo on the package promised quality and reliability.

meanings.definition: The divine word of God in Christian theology.
meanings.sent1: The priest spoke of the power of the divine logos.
meanings.sent2: Believers find comfort in the teachings of the sacred logos.
meanings.sent3: The divine logos seemed to echo through the ancient halls.
meanings.sent4: In the silence of prayer, the logos of faith resonated.
meanings.sent5: The divine logos shines as a beacon of hope in times of darkness.
